scripts.native:rebuild: pnpm approve-builds better-sqlite3 && pnpm -F @app/desktop add -D electron-rebuild && pnpm -F @app/desktop exec electron-rebuild -f -w better-sqlite3 && pnpm rebuild electron esbuild
scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules apps/**/node_modules apps/**/dist* pnpm-lock.yaml && pnpm install && pnpm run native:rebuild
